quote: What kills a person at twenty-five? Leukemia. An accident. But George knows the better odds are that someone who passes at that age dies of unhappiness. Drug overdose. Suicide. Reckless behavior.
quote_letters: WHAT KILLS A PERSON AT TWENTY-FIVE LEUKEMIA AN ACCIDENT BUT GEORGE KNOWS THE BETTER ODDS ARE THAT SOMEONE WHO PASSES AT THAT AGE DIES OF UNHAPPINESS DRUG OVERDOSE SUICIDE RECKLESS BEHAVIOR
